programme.title: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: A Vingança de Ulzana, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: Arizona, século XIX. Quando um grupo de índios apaches desertores, liderados pelo terrível Ulzana, começa a saquear e massacrar as pessoas que vivem nos campos.

programme.title: Sua Última Façanha, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jack Burns tem um plano para tirar seu amigo, Paul Bondi, da prisão. Para ser preso, Jack se mete em uma briga de bar.

programme.title: A Marca do Zorro, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Don Diego Vega é chamado de volta de seu treinamento com os oficiais de elite na Espanha para a Califórnia, onde encontra seu pai, o alcaide, deposto e o povo vivendo sob o jugo tirano dos espanhóis.

programme.title: Ainda Me Chamam Campo Santo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Os irmãos McIntire tiveram uma educação primorosa na Inglaterra, graças às riquezas que a fazenda de seu velho pai proporcionou.

programme.title: Mato Em Nome Da Lei, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: O rancheiro Vincent Bronson e seus vaqueiros causam destruição na cidade de Bannock durante uma bebedeira. Eles disparam a esmo e acabam por, sem saberem, matar um lojista.

programme.title: O Parceiro do Diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax é um assaltante de banco que foi traído e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de prisão.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Intermediário.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. O empresário Jack Harris tem uma linda família e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemáticas. Até que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Terminal Sud: Luta Por Liberdade, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Em um país mergulhado em um conflito armado, um médico tenta cumprir seu dever contra todas as probabilidades, até o dia em que seu destino vira de cabeça para baixo.

programme.title: Um homem sem passado, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Noam é um morador de rua que sofre de amnésia e é constantemente assombrado por pesadelos de seu passado. Após presenciar a morte de seu único amigo, ele decide buscar por justiça, ainda que isso custe ter o seu misterioso passado revelado.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: American Poltergeist - Possuídos, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Ted e Lauren alugam uma velha casa no campo, de um homem chamado Jim, para trabalhar em seu estudo. À medida que o tempo passa, o casal se torna cada vez mais desconfiado dos acontecimentos e do estranho comportamento de seu anfitrião.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi são perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: A Invasão Zumbi, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando zumbis tomam conta de São Francisco, um grupo desesperado sobrevive trancando-se dentro da prisão de Alcatraz. Quando os mortos-vivos violam a ilha, nossos heróis são forçados a retornar ao continente invadido pelos mortos-vivos.

programme.title: American Poltergeist - Possuídos, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Ted e Lauren alugam uma velha casa no campo, de um homem chamado Jim, para trabalhar em seu estudo. À medida que o tempo passa, o casal se torna cada vez mais desconfiado dos acontecimentos e do estranho comportamento de seu anfitrião.

programme.title: O Mistério de Anne, (2020, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Uma mulher mentalmente doente com um grave distúrbio de personalidade desenvolve uma estranha relação com suas bonecas. Ela se torna vítima de insônia e até mesmo de automutilação. Cabe a seu filho revelar a estranha verdade sobre a doença de Anne.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Velocipastor, (2019, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seus pais, um padre viaja para a China, onde herda uma habilidade misteriosa que lhe permite se tornar um dinossauro. Horrorizado com esse novo poder, uma prostituta o convence a usá-lo para combater o crime.

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.

programme.title: O Dragão de Natal, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Ayden, uma jovem mulher na Europa medieval, é a única pessoa que pode salvar o Natal depois de um duende moribundo lhe entregar um cristal mágico. Ayden e outros órfãos devem escapar às criaturas de fantasia para devolver o feitiço ao norte.

programme.title: Crônicas da Tribo Fantasma, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando fósseis gigantes são descobertos perto da Mongólia, uma expedição é organizada para analisá-los. Quando uma explosão deixa os membros da equipe de escavação enterrados no subsolo, eles descobrem um templo ciclópico e bestas gigantes antigas.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: O Garoto de Ouro, (2020, Children)

programme.title: O Mágico Circo de Noel, (2019, Children)

programme.title: Arn: O Cavaleiro Templário, (2007, Adventure)

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade, (1989, Adventure)
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, (2011, Crime)
programme.desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

programme.title: The Patriot, (2000, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: In 1776 South Carolina, widower and legendary war hero Benjamin Martin (Mel Gibson) finds himself thrust into the midst of the American Revolutionary War as he helplessly watches his family torn apart by the savage forces of the British Redcoats.

programme.title: Jack Reacher, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher leaps off the pages of Lee Child's novel and onto the big screen in this thriller. When a horrible crime is committed, all evidence points to the suspect in custody, who offers up a single note in defense: "Get Jack Reacher!"

programme.title: Julie & Julia, (2009, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Julie & Julia, tells the true stories of how Julia Child's life and cookbook inspired fledgling writer Julie Powell to whip up 524 recipes in 365 days and introduce a new generation to the magic of French cooking.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Foxfire, (1996, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: This film is about four high-school girls, who find that they are all being made to perform sexually with their biology teacher. This discovery leads them to become allies and friends. Shortly afterward, they exact revenge on their teacher.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Things go awry when car salesman Jerry Lundegaard (William H. Macy) hires two thugs to kidnap his wife. Soon, the very pregnant and chipper Police Chief Marge Gunderson (Frances McDormand) takes the case. Is she up for the challenge? You betcha.

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers, (2001, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Eden Lake, (2008, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A young couple travels to a remote lake quarry in England, only to fend off a group of teenage hoods.

programme.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Sally moves to Rhode Island to live with her father and his new girlfriend in their 19th-century mansion. While exploring the house, Sally starts to hear voices coming from creatures in the basement whose hidden agenda is to claim her as one of their own.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the "moonlight murders" begin again. A lonely high school girl, with dark secrets of her own, may be the key to catching him.

programme.title: Red State, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: The abduction of three teenaged boys leads to a guns-blazing standoff between a military task force and a band of fanatical fundamentalists.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off, (1986, Screwball)
programme.desc: High school senior, Ferris Bueller, decides to cut school and is determined to experience a day of pure freedom with his girlfriend and best friend in downtown Chicago before graduating.

programme.title: Stripes, (1981, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger (Murray) loses his job, his car, his apartment and his girlfriend, all in one day, he decides he only has one option: volunteer for Uncle Sam.

programme.title: Roxanne, (1987, Romance)
programme.desc: Comic genius Steve Martin delivers an incredible performance as an engaging small town fire chief who has only one tiny flaw - no, make that one HUGE flaw - his astonishingly long nose.

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb?, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: John Candy is bigger, better and more bumbling than ever as a soft-headed private eye determined to crack a kidnapping case.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Road to Perdition, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

programme.title: Armored, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: A crew of officers at an armored transport security firm embark on the ultimate heist – against their own company. The seemingly fool-proof plan soon proves to be useless when an unexpected witness interferes, as the plan quickly unravels.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Hired to steal a rare painting, an ambitious art dealer becomes consumed by his own greed and insecurity as the operation spins out of control.

programme.title: Get the Gringo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A career criminal nabbed by Mexican authorities is placed in a tough prison, where he learns to survive with the help of a young boy.

programme.title: 48 Hrs., (1982, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Nolte is a rough-edged cop after two vicious cop-killers. He can't do it without the help of smooth Murphy, who is serving time for a half-million dollar robbery.

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs., (1989, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Times may change…but these guys don’t! Eddie Murphy and Nick Nolte are back on the streets in this smash sequel.

programme.title: Season of the Witch, (2011, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Marie Antoinette, (2006, Independent Drama)

programme.desc: In an effort to save the Satellite Sector from being destroyed, Yusei agrees to face off against a former friend turned Dark Signer in a Shadow Duel.

programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei confronts his former friend Kalin about their past in an effort to stop him from awakening the Army of Shadows.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: The safety of the world hangs in the balance as Yusei tries to figure out a way to outduel and outmaneuver the unstoppable power of Kalin's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Leo is forced to take part in an extrasensory examination with the leader of the Arcadia Movement. Can Leo pass this pop quiz, or will this psychic showdown with Sayer leave Leo locked up forever?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Lazar's creepy clowns about to crack Crow's defense, Crow hatches a plan to lull his opponent into a false sense of security so that his feathered friends can swoop in and swipe the last of Lazar's life points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei gets caught up in a web of lies after agreeing to square off against Roman, the leader of the Dark Signers.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of his friends literally hanging in the balance, Yusei must figure out a way to squash Roman's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him and his pals to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Luna gears up to face Devack in a Shadow Duel, but before the first card can be thrown, Luna is transported back to the Spirit World, leaving her pint-sized brother Leo the tall task of taking down this Dark Signer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As Luna searches the Spirit World for a way to free Ancient Fairy Dragon from her stone prison, Leo searches his deck for a card combo that will help him defeat Devack and his army of apes.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Luna and her new found friend Torunka hatch a plan to free Regulus from King Zeman's minus curse. Meanwhile, back in the Satellite Sector, Leo calls upon his Power Tool Dragon to help him dismantle Devack's dark deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Luna's plan to free Ancient Fairy Dragon falls apart, Regulus must come to her rescue in order to save her and the Spirit World from Zeman's minus curse.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Carly sets out hoping to uncover the mystery behind the Crimson Dragon, but after digging up some damaging dirt on the Arcadia Movement, she soon finds herself squaring off in a psychic duel with Sayer.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Sayer signs up for a Shadow Duel against a Dark Signer who's out for revenge while Akiza agrees to battle a dark and sinister supermodel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the Dark Signer double duel draws to a climactic close, Carly and Misty unfold a catastrophic card combo that could send Akiza and Sayer to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After Akiza falls into a state of unconsciousness, her father turns to Yusei in a last ditch effort to wake his beloved daughter from her catatonic condition.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Signers presses on, Yusei turns to his trusty Stardust Dragon in an effort to keep the power of Akiza's Black Rose Dragon at bay.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With Yusei, Jack, Akiza and Luna all gathered together, Director Goodwin seizes the moment and decides to shed some light on the dark and formidable foes the four Signers will soon be battling.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: In an effort to rid the Satellite Sector of the Dark Signers, Crow ventures out and challenges a sinister looking sneak to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Crow challenges the newest member of the Dark Signers to a Turbo Duel, but before Crow's Blackwings can even take flight, his opponent unleashes an aerial assault of his own.
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the sky-high battle between Crow and Greiger heats up, Crow looks to elevate his game in order to ground Greiger's aerial attacks before they send him to the Netherworld forever.
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Crow turns to his feathered friends in a last ditch effort to take out Greiger's Earthbound Immortal. Can Crow and his Blackwing's rise to the occasion?
programme.sub-title: A Whale of a Ride, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Haunted by the memories of his last battle with Kalin, Yusei looks to bury the past by agreeing to duel his former friend in a rematch. Can Yusei defeat Kalin and seal the tower that this Dark Signer is guarding?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the rematch between Kalin and Yusei continues, Yusei must find a way to out-think and out-maneuver the dark power of Kalin's Earthbound Immortal before it sends him to the Netherworld forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Roman challenges Yusei to a Shadow Duel at the site of the original Ener-D Reactor. Meanwhile, Director Goodwin decides to make an unexpected visit to the Satellite Sector to settle some unfinished business he has with his Dark Signer brother.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Roman rages on, Roman takes a time out to reveal the truth behind the original Ener-D Reactor's meltdown and the role Yusei's father played.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack agrees to Turbo Duel Carly in an effort to defeat the darkness that has taken control of her. Can Jack rid the evil that has come to possess this one-time roving reporter?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Jack kicks his duel into overdrive and summons his Red Dragon Archfiend in a desperate attempt to free Carly from the Dark Signers' control.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Hoping to finally find out the whereabouts of her long-lost brother, Misty challenges Akiza to a Shadow Duel in a maze of mirrors.

programme.title: Luffy, Ace, and Sabo take pirate lessons from a mysterious old scallywag who just might know the secret to defeat the big tiger – and becoming a good captain!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE AGAINST THE BIG TIGER! WHO IS GOING TO BE CAPTAIN?!

programme.title: The brothers are captured by a gang of pirates, and Sabo is handed over to his noble father, where the boy quickly discovers a sinister plot to destroy Gray Terminal forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FREEDOM TAKEN AWAY! THE NOBLES' PLOT CLOSING IN ON THE BROTHERS!

programme.title: While flames spread across Gray Terminal, Sabo makes a desperate attempt to escape the trappings of his noble birth and save his brothers. Meanwhile, Luffy and Ace must fight to avoid an untimely end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIRE HAS BEEN SET! THE GRAY TERMINAL IN CRISIS!

programme.title: Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last-ditch escape attempt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WHERE CAN FREEDOM BE FOUND? A SAD DEPARTURE OF A BOY!

programme.title: Luffy and Ace receive troubling reports of a Celestial attack on Sabo's ship. Ace is eager to seek out the responsible parties and exact revenge, but a letter from his absent brother tempers his eagerness to fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TAKE GOOD CARE OF HIM! A LETTER FROM THE BROTHER!

programme.title: In the wake of Sabo's death, Luffy and Ace grow stronger than ever by continuing their daily routine of nonstop fighting. As the years pass, each brother prepares to set sail in search of future adventures!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO THE PROMISE! DEPARTURES OF THEIR OWN!

programme.title: Garp takes a beating from a heartbroken mountain bandit, and a big blue friend helps Luffy drown his despair in the newfound desire to reunite with his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WANT TO SEE THEM! LUFFY'S MOURNFUL CRY!

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats are crushed to learn the tragic fate of Fire Fist Ace. Despite their own unique problems, the crew members' thoughts immediately turn to their crestfallen captain.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HATS IN SHOCK! THE BAD NEWS HAS REACHED THEM!

programme.title: Luffy is determined to reassemble his scattered crew, but a powerful old friend forces him to rethink his plans. Meanwhile, Usopp fights to escape an island that wants to have him for lunch!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REUNITED WITH DARK KING RAYLEIGH! DECISION TIME FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Desperate to reach Luffy, Nami risks her life to escape from an island of weather wizards. Meanwhile, Franky rides a carbonation high through the ice and snow in search of a seaworthy vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO OUR CAPTAIN! A JAIL BREAK AT THE SKY ISLAND AND THE INCIDENT ON THE WINTER ISLAND!

programme.title: Zoro's escape attempt is thwarted by a gang of sword-slinging baboon bullies. Brook uses music to end a feud between irate islanders with unequal arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ENCOUNTER! THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! ZORO'S SELF-WILLED DEADLY STRUGGLE!

programme.title: Chopper hitches a ride on a giant bird, Luffy makes a shocking return to Marineford, and Sanji finds himself fighting the most beautiful man he's ever seen!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DISASTER FOR SANJI! THE QUEEN'S RETURN TO THE KINGDOM!

programme.title: Luffy along with Jimbei and Dark King Rayleigh, cause quite the commotion upon their return to Marineford. Meanwhile, powerful pirates all across the globe wreak havoc on the innocent!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hopes to send a message to his mates by way of a clue hidden in a newspaper article. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders protect the Straw Hat's ship from scandalous scavengers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: WITH HOPES IT WILL REACH MY FRIENDS! BIG NEWS SPREADING FAST!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PIRATES GET ON THE MOVE! ASTOUNDING NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Nami uses her feminine charms to learn about the New World weather. Franky moves into Dr. Vegapunk's laboratory, and Sanji must fight to stay out of a cute dress!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LIVING THROUGH HELL! SANJI'S FIGHT FOR HIS MANHOOD!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue preparations for their voyage to the New World as Robin heads for a meeting with the Revolutionary Dragon. Usopp aspires to become King of the Snipers, and Zoro begs his mortal enemy to train him!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I WILL GET MUCH, MUCH STRONGER! ZORO'S PLEDGE TO HIS CAPTAIN!

programme.title: Dark King Rayleigh takes Luffy to a deadly, deserted island for two years of intense battle training! If the Straw Hat captain wants to survive in the New World, he'll have to hone his hidden powers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TRAINING BEGINS! TO THE PLACE WE PROMISED IN 2 YEARS!

programme.title: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW CHAPTER! THE STRAW HATS REUNITED!

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they'll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they've made in the last two years!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE TOGETHER! LUFFY, SETTING OUT FOR THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING FACT! THE MAN WHO GUARDED THE SUNNY!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY COMBAT UNDER THE SEA! THE DEMON OF THE OCEAN STRIKES!

programme.title: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOST IN THE DEEP SEA! THE STRAW HATS GET SEPARATED!

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNDERSEA VOLCANIC ERUPTION! DRIFTING TO THE FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there's no guarantee they'll survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE FISHMAN ISLAND! BEAUTIFUL MERMAIDS!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXCITEMENT BLOW-OUT! SANJI'S LIFE UNDER THREAT!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FISHMAN ISLAND WILL BE ANNIHILATED?! SHARLEY'S PROPHECY!

programme.title: After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying vision—that Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KING OF THE FISHMAN ISLAND! NEPTUNE, THE GOD OF THE SEA!

programme.title: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE! TAKEN BY THE SHARK THAT THEY SAVED!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Last Action Hero, (1993, Adventure)
programme.desc: Action-adventure superstar Arnold Schwarzenegger bursts through the screen as a larger-than-life movie hero in this nonstop adventure from acclaimed director John McTiernan (Predator, Die Hard). Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man who’s never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Saving Silverman, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: Darren, Wayne and J.D. have been inseparable since grade school. However, their friendship is put to the test when Darren meets Judith, a young lady with the looks of an angel and the demeanor of the devil himself.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighbourhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations, (2003, Musical)
programme.desc: To collect his aunt's inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: Hot Rod, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A comedy about a stunt man who’s never successfully landed a jump without wiping out and his attempt to master the biggest stunt of his life.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Maggie returns, to the dismay of Negan; the trials she endured since leaving have made her harder in order for her and her son to survive; Daryl and Maggie unexpectedly fight an unseen and unknown threat.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl and Carol find an old cabin that takes Daryl back to his years away from the group after Rick disappeared; he relives the painful memory of meeting a reticent survivor and the toxic events that amplified his relationship with Dog.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: With Maggie's map, Gabriel and Aaron search for food and supplies to bring back to Alexandria; checking out one more location, they chance upon a stash; faith is broken and optimism is fragmented when they are put to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manhã eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles têm a fazer é pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Então eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins começam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

programme.title: Sharknado 3: Oh, Não!
programme.desc: Quando uma massa de Sharknados ameaça a Costa Leste dos Estados Unidos, o herói Fin, empunhando uma motosserra, deve novamente arriscar sua vida para salvar seus filhos nas férias de primavera. Mas enquanto ele luta para chegar ao sul, os sharknados se fundem e ficam maiores do que nunca.

programme.title: Osso Duro
programme.desc: Na Ásia para doar seu rim para sua sobrinha moribunda, Deacon, acorda no dia anterior à operação para descobrir que ele é a mais recente vítima de roubo de órgãos. irritado, Deacon desce de seu hotel em busca de seu rim roubado e esculpe um caminho empapado de sangue através dos lugares mais escuros da cidade. O relógio está correndo para sua sobrinha e com cada passo ele perde sangue

programme.title: Guerreiros do Amanhã
programme.desc: O que começa como uma aventura para adolescentes irresponsáveis (diversão, praia, hormônios em fúria) logo adquire um tom apocalíptico quando uma guerra contra a Austrália é deflagrada, o que ninguém poderia prever. Os oito adolescentes precisam escapar e tentar sobreviver em um mundo que não se parece mais com o que era antes.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: História do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianças do Sudão, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixão às crianças e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Assassinos Anônimos
programme.desc: A tensão está insuportável dentro do Assassinos Anônimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos estão tentando descobrir qual deles está por trás de um atentado contra um importante senador.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele não tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leão
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a África do Sul com sua família para administrar uma fazenda de leões e desenvolve um vínculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leão branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura épica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Lago Encantado
programme.desc: Jamie, de nove anos, e seus novos amigos de escola devem provar que a doce e mítica criatura marinha do lago é real para salvar sua cidade de um magnata ganancioso. Uma sereia e um mapa do tesouro juntam-se a esta aventura mágica.

programme.title: Diamond Dog Caper
programme.desc: Um corajoso menino enfrenta uma gangue de ladrões trapalhões para resgatar um cão que carrega uma fortuna em diamantes roubados.

programme.title: Cartas para Deus
programme.desc: Um menino lutando contra o câncer escreve cartas para Deus, inspirando esperança entre todos.

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Após a morte de sua esposa grávida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey
programme.desc: Baseado no livro "Walt Antes do Mickey", conta os primeiros anos da carreira de Walt Disney.

programme.title: O Caçador e o Livro Mágico
programme.desc: Um lendário caçador de demônios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que forças malignas estão sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: O Lago Encantado
programme.desc: Jamie, de nove anos, e seus novos amigos de escola devem provar que a doce e mítica criatura marinha do lago é real para salvar sua cidade de um magnata ganancioso. Uma sereia e um mapa do tesouro juntam-se a esta aventura mágica.

programme.title: Diamond Dog Caper
programme.desc: Um corajoso menino enfrenta uma gangue de ladrões trapalhões para resgatar um cão que carrega uma fortuna em diamantes roubados.

programme.title: Walt, Antes de Mickey
programme.desc: Baseado no livro "Walt Antes do Mickey", conta os primeiros anos da carreira de Walt Disney.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Slevin Kelevra (Josh Hartnett) está com vários problemas em sua vida. O prédio onde mora foi condenado, sua carteira de identidade foi roubada e ele recentemente flagrou sua namorada na cama com outro homem. Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. Paralelamente um plano está sendo tramado no submundo do crime de Nova York. Para se vingar da morte de seu filho, o Chefe (Morgan Freeman) planeja um golpe no filho de seu arquiinimigo, o Rabino (Ben Kingsley). O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dívida. O escolhido é Nick Fisher, o que faz com que Goodkat vá até seu apartamento e confunda Slevin com seu alvo.

programme.title: Insanidade
programme.desc: Em uma instalação subterrânea, cinco cientistas acordam do sono criogênico sem se lembrar de quem são ou há quanto tempo estão dormindo. Eles logo chegam a uma conclusão chocante: um assassino está caçando-os lá embaixo e pode até estar escondido entre eles.

programme.title: Sem evidências
programme.desc: Dizem que os crimes foram satânicos. A verdade pode ser mais assustadora.

programme.title: Ring 2: O Chamado
programme.desc: Reiko esconde Yôichi quando seu filho começa a exibir poderes terríveis. Enquanto isso, Mai Takano e as autoridades começam uma busca desesperada por eles, enquanto a misteriosa maldição do Anel se espalha.

programme.title: Abismo do Medo
programme.desc: Um ano após um trágico acidente, algumas amigas vão explorar uma caverna. Uma delas, Juno (Natalie Jackson Mendoza), sem avisar as outras, as levou para uma caverna que nenhuma pessoa tinha explorado. Logo elas descobrem que talvez alguém tenha entrado ali, mas nunca saído vivo. Um acidente faz com que uma rocha se desprenda e as amigas fiquem presas na caverna. Com a saída bloqueada, elas passam a explorar o local, buscando outro meio de sair. Porém elas passam a ser perseguidas por estranhas criaturas, que se escondem na escuridão da caverna.

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte
programme.desc: Dallas, Texas. Ben Garvey (Paul Walker) leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa (Piper Perabo) e a filha Katie (Garvey Brooklyn). Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda está em período de experiência. É quando recebe a visita de seu irmão Ricky (Shawn Hatosy), que acabou de deixar a prisão. Ele oferece a Ben a oportunidade de participar do roubo de 12 kg de ouro em pó, pertencentes a um laboratório. Ben inicialmente recusa a proposta, mas após ser demitido volta atrás e a aceita. Só que tudo dá errado, já que Ricky, seu parceiro Phelps (Alex Sol) e um segurança são mortos. Ben é condenado pelas mortes, sendo sentenciado à morte por uma injeção letal. Após a execução, Ben subitamente desperta em uma comunidade localizada em Dundee, no Oregon. O responsável pelo feito é o padre Ezra (Bob Gunton), que lhe diz que sua vida anterior é passado e agora tem em mãos uma segunda chance.

programme.title: Efeito Dominó
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construído um túnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De lá foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jóias, no valor de milhões de libras.

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacável ex.

programme.title: Tráfico de Mulheres
programme.desc: Nesta história inspirada em personagens reais, três garotas dos EUA, Nigéria e Índia são traficadas por meio de uma elaborada rede global e escravizadas em um bordel no Texas, e devem juntas tentar uma fuga ousada para retomar sua liberdade.

programme.title: 6 Balas
programme.desc: Quando a filha de um lutador de MMA é sequestrada, há somente um homem que pode ajudar a encontrá-la – um notório ex-mercenário, cujo boatos, levou seis tiros no peito.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive é contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: Na Terra de Amor e Ódio
programme.desc: Durante a Guerra da Bósnia, Danijel, um soldado que luta pelos sérvios, reencontra Ajla, uma mulher bósnia, que se tornou prisioneira no campo que ele supervisiona. Esta relação promissora se torna ambígua, a partir do momento que suas intenções se tornam incertas.

programme.title: História de um Assassinato
programme.desc: Vera (Sienna Miller), uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemático (Nick Matthews) entrar em seu apartamento. As coisas se complicam quando ele decide atacá-la

programme.title: A Família
programme.desc: Um chefe mafioso e sua família são transferidos para uma cidade dorminhoca na França, sob o programa de proteção de testemunhas, depois de denunciar a máfia.

programme.title: Tráfico de Mulheres
programme.desc: Nesta história inspirada em personagens reais, três garotas dos EUA, Nigéria e Índia são traficadas por meio de uma elaborada rede global e escravizadas em um bordel no Texas, e devem juntas tentar uma fuga ousada para retomar sua liberdade.
